snippet: Gov. Bobby Jindal vetoed a bill Friday requiring that dogs in the back of pickup trucks be secured with a leash, crate or a ventilated truck bed cover on Interstate highways.
abstract: Louisiana's Republican Gov Bobby Jindal vetoes bill requiring that dogs in the back of pickup trucks be secured with a leash, crate or a ventilated truck bed cover on Interstate highways; calls proposal a 'nanny state' bill.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Bobby Jindal vetoed a bill Friday requiring that dogs in the back of pickup trucks be secured with a leash, crate or a ventilated truck bed cover on Interstate highways.

headline.main: Louisiana: Loose Dogs Allowed to Ride in Pickup Trucks
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Loose Dogs Allowed to Ride in Pickup Trucks
